roof_cleaning.description: Roof cleaning pricing based on roof surface type and square footage.

pressure_wash.notes: Used for durable roof surfaces where pressure washing is appropriate.

soft_wash.notes: Used for asphalt shingle roofs to minimize surface damage.

house_wash.description: Soft wash house cleaning for siding and exterior surfaces.
special_notes: If the customer mentions black streaks, Sunny should explain that low-cost spot treatments may be available depending on scope.
Sunny must not auto-discount or quote a reduced price without confirming scope.

solar_panel_cleaning.description: Solar panel cleaning using pure, filtered, deionized water and a purpose-built solar brush. No chemicals are ever used.

water_policy.warranty_safe_statement: Panels are cleaned according to manufacturer-intended methods to avoid warranty issues.

escalation_rules.escalation_reason: Large systems require a human review for access, safety, and logistics.
